Galpagos is the eleventh novel written by American author Kurt Vonnegut. The 
novel questions the merit of the human brain from an evolutionary perspective. 
The title is both a reference to the islands on which part of the story plays out, and 
a tribute to Charles Darwin on whose theory Vonnegut relies to reach ... This ship 
is used for the "Nature Cruise of the Century".
